name: Aviat Networks
overview: Aviat Networks, Inc. (Aviat Networks), formerly Harris Stratex Networks, Inc., incorporated in 2006, is a supplier of wireless transmission solutions. The Company provides Internet protocol (IP) networking expertise toward building a carrier class foundation for mobile and fixed broadband networks. With more than 750,000 systems installed around the world, the Company offers best-of-breed solutions including long term evolution (LTE)-ready microwave backhaul and a complete portfolio of service and support options to public and private telecommunications operators worldwide. Its products also include both point-to-point (PTP) and point-to-multipoint (PMP) digital microwave transmission systems designed for first/last mile access, middle mile/backhaul, and long distance trunking applications. Aviat Networks offers a range of products and services through two business segments based on geographical markets: North America and International.
